meico.app.gui

Class VerovioGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.app.gui.VerovioGenerator

  • class VerovioGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides tools to generate Verovio code (for score rendering).
    Author:
    Axel Berndt

    • Method Detail

      • readPrototypeHtml

        public static java.lang.String readPrototypeHtml(java.lang.Object caller)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        This method reads the file "/resources/Verovio/verovio.html" from the jar. This file provides the prototype html document. It contains a placeholder "replaceMe" to insert the MEI code.
        Parameters:
        caller -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        caller -
